reviews.author: Forrest Templin
reviews.review: The entire team at Daylight and their dedication to serving the  community is truly inspiring. The tenant portal, communication systems, and admin tools are very easy to use but, more importantly the people at Daylight are compassionate and honest.

reviews.author: nathaniel bond
reviews.review: The staff is great, and the building I lived in (the Leopold building) was wonderful. Jena Curry and the rest managing the Leopold apartments were excellent. They were really quick to respond to whatever issues I had, and were happy to help

ownerResponse.text: Hi Nathaniel. We really appreciate the feedback! Thank you for choosing the Leopold Apartments and we hope you are doing well and staying healthy during this pandemic.

reviews.author: Rena Priest
reviews.review: I rented from Daylight for 5 years. It was the best rental experience I've ever had. Whenever I needed anything at all, Daylight responded immediately. The building was safe and secure and clean. The neighbors were cool. The staff were

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Rena.  Congratulations on becoming a homeowner!  We so appreciated having you as a Tenant.

reviews.author: Simon Grant
reviews.review: I rented from Daylight Properties for 2 years, and they were responsive and accommodating all the way through, from move in to move out. Prices were fair and staff were friendly, I was given prompt communication about

ownerResponse.text: Thanks, Simon! It's great to hear of good experiences from our past tenants. We enjoyed renting to you and would love to have you back any time. Cheers!

reviews.author: Rebecca Hall
reviews.review: Residential listings that range from the tiny unique to the custom lovely Leopold. Commercial spots to start your business throughout Whatcom County. Helpful office staff and maintenance.

reviews.author: Dana Christiansen
reviews.review: You make an error they charge you $50 but when they make an error and charge you too much it doesnt matter. And in fact say it is because you didnt put a limit on the automatic withdrawal so they can charge whatever they want. Awful!!!!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Claire for your positive review!  We wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors!
Hi Hayley!  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We would love to hear more about what happened and if we can make it right.  Please feel free to call our office or email us!
